body.name: OSBED Shredded Memory Foam Pillows Queen Size Set of 2, Cooling Pillows for Sleeping 2 Pack, Adjustable Loft Bed Firm or Soft Pillows for Side, Back, Stomach, Hot Sleepers (20"x 30")
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 20 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: BAMBOO COOLING PILLOW - Hey! hot sleepers, are you tired of waking up sweaty? Why not try this cooling pillows for sleeping? OSBED cooling memory foam pillow designed with cooling fibers that truly keep you cool. The cooling side is made of cooling ice silky fabric, and the soft side is made of ultra-breathable bamboo fiber material, providing a healthier, cooler sleeping atmosphere.

ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT AND SUPPORT - Unlike traditional pillows, fillings of these shredded memory foam pillows could be added or removed to suit your size, shape, or sleep position. It can provide maximum comfort in any sleeping position and is ideal for sleeping on the side, stomach, and back.

COMFORT BREATHFUL AND FIRM - Double-sided pillow, featuring cooling ice silk material on one side and soft bamboo rayon on the other side! OSBED pillows queen size set of 2 will provide personalized support to your head, neck, and shoulders, relieving pain and enhancing your sleep.

PREMIUM MATERIAL - Certificated by CertiPUR-US, the memory foam pillows 2 pack for sleeping are an ideal choice for all sleepers. The queen pillows 2 pack (20"W x 30"L) is designed with a double cover, the inner cover is made of spandex fabric, the outer cover is double-sided, the cooling side is made of cooling ice silky fabric, and the soft side is made of 40% bamboo rayon 60% polyester. Additionally, we use freshly produced shredded memory foam to ensure better softness and support.

IDEAL HEALTH GIFT CHOICE AND HASSLE FREE SERVICE - Perfect Christmas gift, birthday gift, Mother's Day gift, or Father's Day gift to friends and families. The queen size pillows have a 1-year warranty and 30-day refund policy. And if have any questions, feel free to contact our service support team, we care about the shopping experience of every customer, and we are willing to provide every customer with our sincere customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These pillows rock
reviews.reviewText: I've had them lil over a month use them every night me n my wife it's firm but soft at the same time it's like the perfect pillow literally soon as you pick your head up it's already back to the way it was outta the box and still are after a couple months I'm impressed and the cooling is an added bonus we love these pillows I highly recommend to people looking for cooling and comfort plus it's a quality pillow worth the money every penny!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great pillows! Cooling and due to the shredded memory foam it is adjustable and not too firm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought for a recent move
reviews.reviewText: I bought these as a house warming to myself and they are still cozy, good side sleeper and back sleep pillow, very thick which is good for me and was not good to the girlfriend who sleeps side and stomach. She likes a thinner pillow however

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my daughter for xmas. She loved them so much, I became jealous of her comfort while sleeping. So, momma bought her a set! I have a history of neck issues and this provides comfort and support with softness, don't know how that is possible. It has a cool side and a warmer side, so no more temperature issues while I sleep. Treat yourself !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is supposed to be a cooling pillow?
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item thinking it was a "Cooling" type pillow as stated in the item description. This pillow feels cool to the touch, but soon as you rest your head on it after 30 seconds to a minute you begin to feel warm. I do not think it "cools" anything in my opinion. The pillow I replaced this with (Mr Pillow) had no such "cooling" label and my head didn't get as warm with that pillow as I do with this one. The pillow overall is nice. It has good weight to it and it is comfortable initially. Till your your head gets warm. Maybe in colder climates this pillow would be ideal? Living in a hot climate I just see no cooling affect after 30 seconds of use. I have been using the pillow now for a week or 2. Its not the worst pillow I have ever bought, but not the best one either. For the price? Its worth trying to see if it suits you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are amazing. They are really fuffy with goid head support. This was my second purchase of them. Going to eventually replace all my other bedroom pillows with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wow, value and comfort. I use one for my back while sitting in my lift chair. I thought it would flatten but it’s awesome. Goes right back into fluffy if you just shake. Follow every direction when you unpack. I love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Now this is really “my pillow” !
reviews.reviewText: Perfect pillow for me. I have to have a very low profile or I will have neck problems . I pulled out enough shredded memory foam out of these to make two more pillows! (Actually will save the excess if case I need to replace it in the future.). Pillow covering looks top notch too. A++.
For the price point, decent pillows. I don't seem to feel the cooling.
Very comfortable pillows. Easy to adjust. Nice and cool as well.

The pillow is more on the medium softness level, which is what I wanted. One side gives you the cool er sensation.Followed the instructions to let is expand for 24 hrs before using and it worked.My neck now has the support needed while sleeping.
Very hard to get a bad sleep with these pillows. Very impressed.
J'adore cette oreiller ! Tres bonne qualité. Confortable et ajustable à votre position de someil. Je recomande!
